text: "A Simple Game" is a 1968 song by The Moody Blues and is the B-side to Ride My See-Saw. It was released as a non-album single from their album In Search of the Lost Chord. ==Four Tops version== In 1971, The Four Tops covered A Simple Game and went to number 3 in the United Kingdom and number 90 in the United States. The songs UK B-side was You Stole My Love. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:The Moody Blues songs Category:Four Tops songs
title: A Simple Game
